products.title: Kent, Duckegg - Roman Blind
products.description: For sophisticated luxury, folded softly and neatly into the romantic drapes of a roman blind, choose the kent range. And, with its cool blue hue, the duck egg brings an extra luxe to the mix. The pretty blue of the duck egg typically works with neutral tones, such as taupes, golds, and fawns, creating an opulent, yet delicately understated, colour scheme that would look simply irresistible in a living room, dining room, or bedroom, whether in a period or contemporary home.

products.title: Kent, Wine - Roman Blind
products.description: The beautifully rich claret of the kent in wine adds cosiness and warmth wherever it goes and whatever it's paired with. It drapes neatly into its folds which, with the sewn in stability batons, are sure not to sag, and will last year upon year. Craft a traditionally styled dining room by teaming the wine with dark woods, cream paints, and gold finishings. If you're feeling extra bold, why not choose a glamorously patterned wallpaper to give the room an extra hit of colour? Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width.

products.title: Kent, Peacock - Roman Blind
products.description: Terrific in teal, the kent peacock is a bright and bold number, and the chenille-feel texturing of the fabric adds luxury and elegance. The softness of the cloth means that it falls easily into the soft arches of the roman, making for a graceful yet lavish finish. For a conventional bathroom with a difference, hang this loosely structured roman blind in the window amongst a white suite, tiling, and walls, and accessorise with matching towels and bath linen.

products.title: Kent, Chocolate - Roman Blind
products.description: Brown doesn't get much deeper, darker, or richer than the sumptuous chocolate from the chenille-textured kent collection. You'll adore the palatable hue this blind gives off, as well as the way in which it falls into the curving roman arches. Team the chocolate with softer lattes, oatmeals, and creams for a cosy and warm ambience in the living room. Opt for polished woods, whether light, medium, or dark, and use shimmering or brushed golds to add an understated sense of glamour to the room.

products.title: Kent, Earth - Roman Blind
products.description: More glamorous than its name implies, the kent earth is a gorgeously textured canvas of shimmering oatmeal that has a lovely chenille feel to it. This muted almost-gold is sure to add elegance and grace to any window, and makes an effective neutral for stronger colours. Use the earth in any colour scheme that you like. A rich teal would stand out beautifully against it, creating a gorgeous colour combination for an ensuite bathroom.

products.title: Kent, Caramel - Roman Blind
products.description: In a delicious golden tone, the kent caramel is true to its name, and its rich look is only emphasised by the soft texturing of the fabric. This sophisticated shade is sure to add class and elegance to any room in the home, and will match a wide range of stronger, bolder hues. Couple the caramel with a jet black for a contemporary yet opulent finish in a new-build's living room. You, and your guests, will love this sumptuous colour combination, which is easily accented with gold and black soft furnishings and accessories.

products.title: Petals (Blackout), Fresh - Roller Blind
products.description: When you want to embrace the ever-popular floral style, and add in a touch of impressionism, petals blackout fresh is perhaps the only way to do it. By showing you a symphony of electric colour every time you lower your roller blind, it allows you to take your decor in an exciting new direction. Matching to petals fresh is all about immersing your senses with other bold and beautiful colours. Working in peaches, oranges, and rosey reds is a great way to integrate a little bit of the magic of the summer sunshine.

products.title: Floral (Blackout), Autumn - Roller Blind
products.description: When you want to be able to introduce a range of colour and form to your home, floral blackout autumn allows you to do it with style and panache. It's all about being free to get truly creative, and letting the fabric tell a story that starts with your blinds, and is then shaped by the rest of your decor choices. If you're struggling to come up with ideas for matching, why not keep things simple? A vase of fresh cut flowers, a few scatter cushions on a leather couch, and plenty of family photos adorning your feature wall are that's required.

products.title: Kent, Charcoal - Roman Blind
products.description: Traditional meets contemporary in the kent charcoal, with its classic chenille-like texture and modern lead grey hue. The unity works beautifully though, forming a rich and luxurious roman blind that you won't want to miss out on. Settle the charcoal amongst a monochromatic colour scheme for modern chic in the dining room. Or, if you love a splash of colour, team with a bright teal for a contemporary and striking tonal look, whether in the living room or master bedroom.

products.title: Highland, Duckegg - Roman Blind
products.description: The rural checks of the highland duck egg are perfect country fare. The soft aqua blue creates a beautiful base for the multi-dimensional lines to cross, and the end result is one that would look at home in any country-style home. Hang the duck egg in the hallway to add a gentle yet effective burst of colour to neutral walls, giving guests an instant hit of rustic style as soon as they walk in. Complement with similar tones but avoid too much matching - this is rural eclecticism after all.

products.title: Highland, Sky - Roman Blind
products.description: The pastel aqua blue of the highland in sky sits pretty against the soft oatmeal and rich cream accents, interjected occasionally by a dark midnight blue and a gentle chocolate brown, whilst the soft tweed fabric emphasises the pretty checked patterning. If you love rich country style but need a little light in your life, the sky would be perfect for your living room. Paint the walls cream, and use browns and duck eggs throughout the room to bring out the hues in the blind.

products.title: Highland, Natural - Roman Blind
products.description: The ultimate in country neutrals, the highland in natural blends rich, creamy biscuit and camel shades for a gorgeously toned effect. This luxe roman blind is ideal for a rural home and will really bring out your love of the country. Surround the natural with similar cream and beige tones, as well as some deeper barky browns and grass and forest greens. Add the occasional print of an animal sketch, such as stags and rabbits, and you have the perfect cosy living room or master bedroom look.

products.title: Highland, Hunter - Roman Blind
products.description: True to its name, the highland hunter allows a deep hunter green to take centre stage in this checked, tweed blind. It sits amidst muddy browns and mustard greens, with the occasional dash of bright rose red, making it a truly country offering. Give the hunter a home in your study or den, where the dark colours will give the room a moody yet cosy feel, and the warmth of the fabric will add homeliness.

products.title: Palm, Dove - Day Night Blind
products.description: The barely-there grey of the palm in dove is so pearlesque it might almost be white. The look is matte, which keeps it simple and subtle, whilst the mesh strips ensure you get light in the room as well as all the privacy you need. Use the dove to offset a bold feature wall, perhaps one painted in a deep plum purple or vivid grass green, or one covered in a vividly patterned wallpaper. Include plenty of other white tones in the room for added balance.

products.title: Palm, Sterling - Day Night Blind
products.description: The palm in sterling displays a subtle duck egg blue with just a hint of grey to its tone. The look is understatedly attractive, whilst the combination of the colour strips and the mesh strips allow privacy without compromising on light. Perfect for a studious look in a home office, or a strong minimalist look in a bedroom, the sterling would sit beautifully against stark whites and soft greys for a fresh and airy feel.

products.title: Palm, Pistachio - Day Night Blind
products.description: A hushed yet pretty lime green blind, interjected by the convenient mesh strips of the day night range, the palm in pistachio is attractive and colourful. Use it to inject some summery vibrancy into your home, no matter what time of year it is. Hang the pistachio against an ice white wall in your street-facing kitchen or bathroom, to ensure privacy without compromising on light. Keep the colour scheme simple with similar lime tones and plenty of white as the background colour.

products.title: Palm, Illusion - Day Night Blind
products.description: Offering a matte silvery grey tone, alongside the transparent mesh of the interjecting strips, the palm illusion is an attractively understated blind that will work in even the most contemporary of homes. Match the illusion to fellow grey, black, and white tones in a modern, luxury living room for a cool monochrome look, or use it to accent brighter, bolder colours such as red, navy, or purple. Keeping the room fairly minimalist, without too much clutter, can really help it to stand out.

products.title: Palm, Sorbet - Day Night Blind
products.description: The sorbet, from the pretty palm range, offers a creamy oatmeal shade that's as subtle as can be. And you don't get the privacy of the colour at the expense of light - the mesh strips mean you can allow plenty of natural light into the room. Use the sorbet as part of a strong colour scheme; the subtle cream tone will help to temper stronger colours, whilst offsetting them at the same time. Think deep navy blue or rich maroon red, either of which would look stunning when set against this pretty cream shade.

products.title: Palm, Sunrise - Day Night Blind
products.description: In a subtle yet sunny yellow tone, the palm in sunrise is an ideal way of bringing some sunshine into your home, even when there isn't any outside. And, with it's interjecting mesh inserts, it offers you the best of both worlds - light and privacy. Settle the sunrise amidst strong charcoal grey tones in a home office or study. Surround with various shades of grey, as well as matching primrose yellow hues.

products.title: Kaleidoscope Deluxe, Clementine High Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.description: Clementine brings a summery touch of energy to your decor that is guaranteed to put a smile on your face. The sleek gloss finishing shimmers in the light and the deluxe touch of the fabric ribbons adds a subtle layer of depth to this uniquely modern finish. Work some yellows into your decor and use clementine in the kitchen so that you can use the glow and radiance of the gloss finishing to spread some cheer and joy into the heart of the home.

products.title: Kaleidoscope Deluxe, Carmen High Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.description: The uplifting and luxurious touch of carmen works in perfect harmony with the gentle addition of the fabric ladder ribbons that add something a little special to your decor. The finish is sleek and the epitome of high quality gloss; exactly the finishing touch you have been searching high and low for. Pair carmen with a soft red to create a beautiful synergy between opposite ends of the colour spectrum.

products.title: Kaleidoscope Deluxe, Magenta High Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.description: Magenta is a modern shade with a little touch of electricity that will make you feel at ease the moment it takes pride of place in your home. The sleek gloss finish and the delicately applied ribbon ladder will add a touch of luxury that puts a smile on your face. Use magenta in the living room and combine it with black leather and white fabric to create a modern look that you will love instantly.

products.title: Roller, 9050 Dark Blue - Velux Loft Blind
products.description: Softens the incoming light. Offers both privacy and good looks. Install in minutes with the velux pick & click system. Fully integrated into the roof window. For an additional charge, this blind is available with a solar powered remote control switch. With no mains electricity or wiring required, blind operation is made simple through the use of a pre-paired, wall mounted remote control switch - ideal for out of reach windows or for a touch of convenience.

products.description: Softens the incoming light. Offers both privacy and good looks. Install in minutes with the velux pick & click system. Fully integrated into the roof window. With no mains electricity or wiring required, blind operation is made simple through the use of a pre-paired, wall mounted remote control switch - ideal for out of reach windows or for a touch of convenience.

products.title: Luxa, Cameo - Vista Blind
products.description: Luxa cameo celebrates the beauty and simplicity that arises when crisp and clean lines are used to create a uniquely modern aesthetic. A brilliant white fabric is the backdrop your eye sees through the delicate voile panelling that hangs so effortlessly in front of it. Adding cameo to the kitchen or dinning room will allow you to introduce some modern form and functionality that will perfectly accentuate your existing decor.

products.title: Luxa, Cream - Vista Blind
products.description: Natura cream breathes life into any modern decorated home by celebrating the interplay between fabric and light. A finely crafted voile is applied with care to a gently shaded cream fabric which is soft to the touch. With different shades flowing effortlessly into one another cream allows you to see something different every time you look at it. Give your living room a modern take on the country style of decor by pairing natura cream with stone grey items such as a rug in front of the fire or a selection of scatter cushions on the sofa.

products.title: Luxa, White - Vista Blind
products.description: Every square inch of luxa white shimmers in the sunlight as it serves as the perfect transition between light and shade. With a finely woven fabric accompanied by a delicate voile to offer you complete control of ambience and light, luxa white allows you to create the perfect environment to suit your mood. Crisp and clean, the modern lines of luxa white make it ideal for the modern fitted bathroom where you can add an understated feature that won't confront your existing decor.
